keyTopics.description: Users are discussing how rewards are distributed among validators and suggesting improvements to staking mechanics.
Multiple users raised concerns about inconsistencies in indexing due to outdated block references.
Builders shared feedback and walkthroughs of deploying smart contracts to the testnet.
Users are helping each other with SDK errors and CLI commands.
Discussion around a new governance proposal to adjust gas subsidies and introduce new community roles.

excitement.title: Rust SDK Alpha Launch
excitement.description: Multiple users expressed excitement and appreciation for the new Rust SDK alpha. They discussed ease of integration and performance improvements.

excitement.title: Validator Rewards Visibility
excitement.description: Community welcomed the new dashboard feature that allows validators to track reward history and performance metrics in real-time.

frustrations.title: Slow Subgraph Syncing on Arbitrum
frustrations.description: Subgraph syncing appears delayed, leading to outdated data in the dashboard and testnet inconsistencies.

frustrations.title: Error on WalletConnect v2 Integration
frustrations.description: Developer is hitting authentication errors when trying to integrate WalletConnect v2 into their DApp using ChainForge SDK.
